title: Server
description: We are looking for an experienced server to join our team. The ideal candidate will have excellent customer service skills and be able to work in a fast-paced environment.
requirements: Ability to work flexible hours including weekends
Must be able to stand for extended periods
responsibilities: Handle cash and credit card transactions
Assist with opening and closing duties

title: Line Cook
description: Seeking a skilled line cook to prepare high-quality dishes in our busy kitchen. Must be able to work efficiently under pressure.
requirements: Ability to work in hot, fast-paced environment
responsibilities: Prepare menu items according to recipes
Maintain food quality and presentation standards
Keep work station clean and organized
Assist with inventory and prep work

title: Host/Hostess
description: Friendly and professional host needed to greet guests and manage seating. First impression matters!
requirements: Ability to multitask in busy environment
Basic computer skills for reservation system
responsibilities: Coordinate with servers on table availability
Handle phone calls and takeout orders
Maintain clean entrance and waiting area
